mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_USER ORDER BY CRT_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_TEL, USER_EMAIL, PERMIT_ID, USE_FLAG, PWD_FCNT, CRT_ID, CRT_DT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, #{permitId}, #{userFlag}, 0, #{userId}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO TB_PERMIT ( PERMIT_ID, PERMIT_NAME, PERMIT_DESC, CRT_ID, CRT_DT ) VALUES ( #{permitId}, #{permitName}, #{permitDesc}, #{crtId}, #{crtDt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_TEL = #{userTel}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, PERMIT_ID = #{permitId}, USE_FLAG = #{userFlag}, UPT_ID = #{userId}, UPT_DT = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_PASS = #{userPass}, UPT_ID = #{userId}, UPT_DT = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
